Description: Flint knife of triangular shape, Edges retouched on both sides and at butt end, cortex remaining at tip.
Curator's comments: Badarian in style, but was found amongst predynastic settlement remains at Badari area 3000 spur 6. Not mentioned by excavator in text. Marked 3000/6 in pencil.
Acquisition name: Donated by: British School of Archaeology, Egypt
